document.text:
From: 
To: Menninger 
Cc: 
Jeff Pa liuca 
Ann 
uni.erg 
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
Date: Sun, 07 Nov 2021 21:49:12 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-11-08 joint_letter_regardingjuror_questionnaires.pdf 
Attached is a draft of a joint letter. Please let us know if you have any edits —  we'll check for accuracy on our end as well, 
but we wanted to circulate so that we could all check at the same time. Please note that, for three jurors, we've 
withdrawn our objection and joined your position that those jurors should proceed to voir dire. Those juror numbers are: 
127, 151, and 458. 
Thanks, 
Menninger 
November 7  2021 3:03 PM 
Ann Lundberg 
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
Sorry Mut we did not use Excel to prepare our list, so I don't know how to convert it. There may be a way to convert 
the pdf to Excel. 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 11:54 AM 
To: Menninger 
Cc: 
Ann Lundberg 
Subject: RE: EXTERNAL RE: questionnaires 
eff Pagliucj 
With apologies for the delay (we ran into an excel glitch), I'm attaching our current list of proposed strikes. Could you 
please send us your list in excel? It makes merging the two lists faster. Thanks! 
From: Menninger 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 1:03 PM 
To: 
< 
> 
eff Pagliuca 
(I 
EFTA00018893

Ann Lundberg 
u je : : : ques ionnaires 
Please find attached Defendant's position on jurors 1-566. 
As I understand it, you will be putting ours into the categories described by the Court (joint keeps, joint strikes, gov't only 
strikes and defense only strikes) and then re-circulating so that we can both check to ensure ours are entered correctly. 
Let me know if you have any questions. 
Thanks, 
From 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 10:57 AM 
To: Menninger 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
eff Pagliuca 
Thanks very much, sounds good, just let us know when you're ready. 
On Nov 7, 2021, at 12:11 PM, Menninger 
Thanks= We are finalizing ours as well and should be done shortly. 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, November 7, 2021 10:08 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: questionnaires 
Hi Chris, 
Menninger 
wrote: 
Jeff Pagliuca 
That's fine, we've completed our review and our paralegal is compiling a list to send over, which shouldn't take much 
longer. 
Thanks 
From: Christian Everdell 
Sent: Sunda November 7  20211:06 AM 
To: Menninger 
;Jeff Pagliuca 
EFTA00018894

Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] RE: questionnaires 
We are still planning to send you our strikes by noon. But we would like to have a simultaneous exchange of strike lists. 
Please send us your list at noon as well. 
Thanks, 
Chris 
From: 
Christian Everdell 
Sent: Saturday, November 6, 2021 2:30 PM 
To: 
elf 
Pagliuca 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: questionnaires 
That's fine, M. We should be able to get you our strikes by then. Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Saturda November 6  2021 12:53 PM 
To: Christian Everdell • 
• Jeff Pagliuca 
u ect: questionnaires 
All, 
Menninger 
Menninger 
Our joint submission is due to the Court tomorrow outlining four categories of juror numbers. We're happy to take on 
the task of compiling data for our joint submission. To that end, could you please email us your list of strikes by noon 
tomorrow? Once we receive your list, we will compile that data into a letter outlining the four categories of juror 
numbers the Court has requested, and we'll send that back to you so that you can double check the accuracy of the 
chart. We estimate that process will take a fair amount of time, which is why we'll need your data by noon tomorrow if 
you'd like us to coordinate the process. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00018895
